name: tammolaube.com
description: Extend the gradle build process with bower
author: Tammo Laube

scripts.build: export styleIn=$(npm run styleIn -s) scriptIn=$(npm run scriptIn -s) styleDist=$(npm run styleDist -s) scriptDist=$(npm run scriptDist -s) && export styleOut=$styleDist/$(npm run styleOut -s) scriptOut=$scriptDist/$(npm run scriptOut -s) && npm run build:setup
scripts.build:setup: npm run bower && npm run clean && npm run build:start
scripts.bower: npm run bower:install && npm run bower:sync
scripts.build:start: npm run build:styles && npm run build:scripts
